_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

CertificateOfOrigin.description: A document that describes the Certificate of Origin.

CertificateOfOrigin.title: Certificate Of Origin. Details
CertificateOfOrigin.description: A document that describes the Certificate of Origin.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Certificate Of Origin. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Certificate Of Origin. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Certificate Of Origin. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Certificate Of Origin. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Certificate Of Origin. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

UUID.title: Certificate Of Origin. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Certificate Of Origin. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Certificate Of Origin. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Description.title: Certificate Of Origin. Description. Text
Description.description: Textual description of the document instance.

Note.title: Certificate Of Origin. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

VersionID.title: Certificate Of Origin. Version. Identifier
VersionID.description: Identifies the version of this Certificate of Origin.

Signature.title: Certificate Of Origin. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

ExporterParty.title: Certificate Of Origin. Exporter_ Party. Party
ExporterParty.description: The Party who makes the export declaration, or on whose behalf the export declaration is made, and who is the owner of the goods or has similar right of disposal over them at the time when the declaration is accepted.

ImporterParty.title: Certificate Of Origin. Importer_ Party. Party
ImporterParty.description: The Party who makes an import declaration, or on whose behalf a Customs clearing agent or other authorized person makes an import declaration. This may include a person who has possession of the goods or to whom the goods are consigned.

CertificateOfOriginApplication.title: Certificate Of Origin. Certificate Of Origin Application
CertificateOfOriginApplication.description: Details of the application for a Certificate of Origin.

IssuerEndorsement.title: Certificate Of Origin. Issuer_ Endorsement. Endorsement

EmbassyEndorsement.title: Certificate Of Origin. Embassy_ Endorsement. Endorsement

InsuranceEndorsement.title: Certificate Of Origin. Insurance_ Endorsement. Endorsement
